shortName.$comment: unique globally; if not set: use name

pixelCount.$comment: amount of pixels in X, Y and Z directions

pixelKeys.$comment: pixelKeys in a structure of arrays for the Z, Y and X directions

name.$comment: if not set: use channel key

defaultValue.$comment: maximum depends on how many fine channels there are (255 if none, 65535 if one, etc.)

highlightValue.$comment: maximum depends on how many fine channels there are (255 if none, 65535 if one, etc.)

items.$comment: maximum depends on how many fine channels there are (255 if none, 65535 if one, etc.)

oneOf.$comment: channel key or channel alias key
template channel key or template channel alias key

items.$comment: maximum depends on how many fine channels there are (255 if none, 65535 if one, etc.)

oneOf.$comment: channel key or channel alias key
template channel key or template channel alias key

then.$comment: defaultValue must be set and all capabilities have to set switchChannels
